project_descr: TERMINAL PHASE-OUT MANAGEMENT PLAN FOR CHLORO FLUORO CARBONS IN GRENADA

outputs.output_descr:
The Terminal Phase-out Management Plan (TPMP) monitoring and management mechanism will ensure the effectiveness of all the projects proposed within the TPMP though constant monitoring and periodic evaluation and reporting of the impacts of the projects against agreed milestones, as well as the recommendations on corrective measures when milestones are not met.  The outputs associated with this project are:
Output 1. Establishment of a Monitoring, Evaluation and Reporting Mechanism.
Output 2. Enforcement of the Licensing Systems and Prevention of Illegal Trade.
Output 3. Training and Certification of Technicians and Establisment  of an Association of Refrigeration Tecnicians. 
Output 4. Provision of Equipment and Retrofit Demonstration.
